Description: Magical gem engraved with a figure with the tail of a snake, the torso of a man, and the head of a bird, wearing the crown of Upper and Lower Egypt and holding a snake (?) in either hand. Inscribed MIYCIC (BM AES 56067). Pen and ink with grey wash on a sheet of paper, which is stuck down onto a second sheet watermarked '1794 J WHATMAN' together with 2010,5006.1098 - 1100; the assemblage framed in a red ink border.
